title: Learn how to create brilliant AI text, images, and video with this $30 AI educational bundle
content:
Macworld

If you’ve ever wanted to harness AI’s creativity potential to produce content for your work, side hustle, or other pursuits, you can now learn how to use many popular AI-powered content creation tools with this educational bundle.

The ChatGPT and Gemini AI Advanced E-Degree learning resource can help you understand this ground-breaking advancement and become a truly empowered AI content creator. Now, lifetime access is only $29.99.

This training, which features 65 lectures and over 10 hours of content, can help any learner grasp AI’s most cutting-edge tools, such as ChatGPT, Gemini AI, GPT 3.5, and more.

With this coursework assembled by Eduonix Learning Solutions, you can explore how to streamline your creative process, boost your productivity, and create all manner of multimedia content with the aid of generative AI.

This e-learning resource’s hands-on, real-world projects include crafting AI-driven text ready for use in scripts, blogs, emails, or other marketing campaigns. You can also learn how to generate images from scratch to accompany social media posts, digital presentations, or web page design. You can even study how to master creating AI video and audio for training sessions, YouTube videos, and more.

Discover how to utilize AI for content creation when you grab the 2024 Complete ChatGPT and Gemini AI Advanced E-Degree for just $29.99.
